menu.title: Tahua
menu.caption: Mea katoa e taea e koe te tiki i roto i {{restaurant.name}}

notAvailable.title: Kāmera kore wātea
notAvailable.subtitle: E kore te mea e wātea ana i runga i tenei pūrere kāmera o te pūtirotiro

camera.takePhoto: E mau ki te whakaahua o reira

service.title: Karangatia he ratonga
service.subtitle: Ki te tenei āhuatanga, ka taea e koe te tono i te ahua o te condiment hokona ranei tetahi ki tou tepu.
service.instruction: Tirohia i roto i na roto i te karapa i te waehere QR i roto i te wharekai tata koe ki te tīmata.

bill.selecting: Tīpakohia te tūemi i roto i te pire
bill.splittingWith: Kei te wahia i waenganui i:

paymentPending: E tatari ana mō te utu ...

currency.title: Whakaatu moni
currency.original: Whakaatu utu i roto i te moni taketake

cart.title: Kete kata
cart.checkInInstructions: Hei tīmata, te matawai i te waehere QR i roto i te wharekai tata
